name: Starter Squad
description: The best team for your first few hours. Easy to craft, covers all roles.
strategy: Use Aqualing as your front-line tank to absorb damage. Ember Pup deals consistent DPS from behind, while Sproutling keeps everyone healed and generates extra resources.
strengths: Easy to build at Lab Level 1-2

name: Mid-Game Rush Team
description: A speed-focused team that overwhelms opponents before they can react.
strategy: All three monsters have high speed stats. Open with Chimera Scout's Adaptive Shield, then unleash Flame Striker and Tidal Serpent's burst damage to end fights quickly.

name: Resource Farming Team
description: Optimized for maximizing essence and currency generation.
strategy: Sproutling and Steam Sprite both generate resources passively. Stone Golem protects them in automated battles. Focus on resource maps and farming stages.

name: Late Game Powerhouse
description: The ultimate PVE team for clearing the hardest content.
strategy: Frost Leviathan tanks everything with its massive HP and defense. Void Reaper deals devastating damage while draining enemy HP. Verdant Wyrm keeps the team alive with powerful healing.

name: PVP Meta Team
description: The current tournament meta. Built for competitive play.
strategy: Shadow Imp opens with Backstab for massive first-strike damage. Solar Phoenix provides sustained DPS with Phoenix Rebirth as a safety net. Celestial Dragon supports with shields and resurrection.
strengths: Phoenix Rebirth provides a second chance
weaknesses: Countered by teams with dispel abilities
